featured.text: Mary lost ten kilograms in three months, so her _____ skin-tight jeans are now hanging off her hips.
“My weight dropped to 48.3 from 54.4 kilograms, and my classmates won’t be able to call me ‘porker’ anymore,” Chang said happily.
The students lost an average of 2.34 kilograms during the past two months, and the student who lost the most, the nine-year-old Howard Chang, shed more than six kilograms.
Different airlines have different _____ for carry-on luggage, but many international airlines limit a carry-on piece to 7 kilograms.
capacity of this elevator is 400 kilograms.

definition.zh_def: 千克，質量的單位，等於一千克的物質。
definition.en_def: A kilogram is a unit of mass in the metric system, equal to one thousand grams.
